about_the_game:
Popular circle Libra Heart presents an all-new action game in all-old school GB color!
Feast your eyes on the pixel world in all its nostalgic monochromatic glory.

Whether you're already an LH fan or playing for the first time, this game's accessible to all comers!

***

Succubus Hunter is a 2d sidescroller that looks like it came straight form the gameboy era of games! Enjoy this extra content for getting Tower and Sword!

To save her little sister, Silvia braves the old castle-----which is now a succubus lair.

Armed with an exorcist's whip, slash your way through 5 stages of monsters who have their own dire designs!

Classic Gameb*y green quad-tone color; the joy of cutting thru swaths of enemies; and titillating pixel ecchi along the way!

30 erotic CG images in total!

Play with a new character on your second playthrough!

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains depictions of graphic sex, in pixel art form. Monsters in the game are capable of non consensual sex with the female, player-controlled protagonist.

Themes in this game include:

> Risque outfits, sexual comments and lewd situations
> Full female and male nudity
> Strong language
> Fantasy sexual situations with exaggerated characters
> Various non-vanilla encounters and non nonsexual sex featuring humans and monsters
> Mild violence
